name: Living Legends: The Frozen Fear Collection
description: Can you uncover the secrets that lay buried within the glaciers of the past? Find out in Living Legends: The Frozen Fear Collection.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP, Windows Vista®, Windows® 7, Windows® 8 Processor: Pentium processor (or equivalent AMD® processor) 1.0 GHz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX® compatible video card Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: A pretty horrible game. It crashes so much you'd probably have a better time making a drinking game out of how often it happens. At least the music was nice enough.
